reviewText: The video was in Russian. Even though the window is closed for sending it back for exchange so that you can sell it to someone who can use it. I have already reordered the correct version and so this has been an expensive video.

Having read the reviews in several places I anticipated I'd be able to play these discs in at least one of my players.
PS3 = Does NOT play past the initial trailer.  Tried several variations, chapter skips...
PS4 = DOES play.
The reason I got this German copy is because it includes the Extras, which the Region 1 disc does not.
Interestingly, even with the language set to English, the scene clips in the Extras are still in German, though the commentary from the actors is in English.

I have always enjoyed reading the books of Terry Brooks, so it was no surprize as to how great the video of The Shannara Chronicles turned out to be.
The production has been a hit and very well performed.

I am looking forward to the continuation of this series and to have the opportunity to own season 2 on blu-ray when it comes out.
Returned 2 copies because were german not english

I bought this blue ray movie because it was advertised for All Regions.  I tried to play on Region A/1 Sony BDPS7200 & Sony BDPS6500 players with updated firmware and the movie would not play.  Only the Preview movie would play and not the feature movie.  I also have a Region Free Player on which the movie played with some control issues.  How do I get this movie to play on a Region A /1Player?
Visually stunning I purchased the blu-ray from Amazon Germany for only $25 it works fine in my U.S.PS4 and Xbox one
